Plot
flutter_plot library
  1. Classes

Plot class

Plot is a StatelessWidget

A CustomPaint is used to draw the Plot, and the CustomPaint is wrapped in a Container so that a user can provide height constraints and layout the plot like they would other widgets. The plot takes all the width that is available.

Constructors

Plot({double height: 200.0, @required List<Point> data, @required PlotStyle style, @required Offset gridSize, @required EdgeInsets padding, String xTitle, String yTitle })
